content: **the dumpster fire doodle** is inspired by how we all feel sometimes while doom-scrolling originally shared in 2025 it was designed to reflect the state of affairs at that time need we say more **the dumpster fire chart** includes a single chart of a dumpster on fire since this chart is free my ask is to use your voice and your wallet to&nbsp support charities and local organizations that support and protect our communities **after knitting your doodle it s time to take action** * call your representatives and voice your concerns * donate to a cause that is meaningful to you email us your donation receipt for a free pattern code * talk to your neighbors and start building community * talk to friends or relatives about what s happening check out #craftivistdoodle for more inspiration this is a doodle series pattern which means it includes micro charts intended to be used as mix-and-match colorwork motifs throughout the project the doodle cup cozy pattern is worked in the round on small circumference needles magic loop or dpns begin with a short ribbing work your colorwork and end with a short ribbing **size** s one size **yarn** any dk light worsted or sport weight yarn in 2-3 colors approx 15-20g per cozy **needles** us 5/3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge 8 in 20 cm circular needles magic loop or dpns **gauge** 24 sts and 24 rounds per 4 in 10 cm in colorwork **notions** 2 stitch markers one in different color scissors & tapestry needle **sharing** please share finished projects using #craftivistdoodle and @pacificknitco 1 https //www usa gov/elected-officials
